properties.name: Ziv Meir
properties.short_bio: Dr. Ziv Meir is an experimental physicist and principal investigator in the Department of Physics of Complex Systems at the Weizmann Institute of Science, where he leads the Molecular-Qubits Laboratory. His research aims to extend quantum-logic techniques—originally developed for trapped-ion quantum computing and optical clocks—to the control, detection, and manipulation of single trapped molecular ions.

properties.name: Roee Ozeri
properties.short_bio: Prof. Roee Ozeri is an experimental physicist working in atomic physics and quantum information science. He was born in Israel and earned a BSc in Physics from the Hebrew University of Jerusalem, followed by an MSc and PhD in Physics from the Weizmann Institute of Science.
